browser_cleaner.bat.description: Deep clean browser history, cache, cookies, bookmarks, and extensions

empty_downloads.bat.description: Clean Downloads folder with options for all files or by age

network_reset.bat.description: Complete network reset: TCP/IP, DNS, Winsock, and firewall

speed_test.bat.description: Test internet download speed and latency

prevent_sleep.bat.description: Prevent computer from sleeping (indefinitely or timed)

windows_defender_toggle.bat.description: Enable or disable Windows Defender protection features

desktop_organizer.bat.description: Organize your desktop files into categorized folders automatically

set_dark_wallpaper.bat.description: Set a premium dark-themed minimalist wallpaper

pro_audio_optimizer.bat.description: Optimize audio latency, set high priority for audio tasks, and configure pro microphone/headset settings

create_system_shortcuts.bat.description: Add essential Windows tool shortcuts to your Desktop Shortcuts folder

winget_auto_updater.bat.description: Automatically check and update ALL installed programs on your PC to their latest versions

cortana_edge_killer.bat.description: Kill and disable Cortana and Microsoft Edge background processes to free up resources

ultimate_privacy_shield.bat.description: Lock down Windows privacy: disable telemetry, ad-ID, Bing search, and clear system audit logs

keylogger_detector.bat.description: Scan for unidentified processes and unusual network connections that could indicate spyware

create_restore_point.bat.description: Instantly create a Windows System Restore point to save your current system state

geo_bypass_dns.bat.description: Quickly switch between Cloudflare, Google, and Quad9 DNS for better privacy, speed, and bypassing geo-blocks

startup_manager.bat.description: Complete startup audit and interactive tool to remove unwanted programs from Windows boot

power_report.bat.description: Generate a detailed HTML report of your PC power consumption, efficiency, and battery health

internet_hog_finder.bat.description: Identify which programs are currently using your internet bandwidth in real-time

ultimate_performance.bat.description: Unlock and activate the hidden Windows Ultimate Performance power plan for maximum hardware power

port_killer.bat.description: Find and kill any process blocking a specific port (e.g., 3000, 8080) - great for coders

network_latency_optimizer.bat.description: Optimize network settings for lower ping and better responsiveness in online games

disk_speed_test.bat.description: Measure real-world disk read and write speeds using Windows System Assessment Tool

task_killer_extreme.bat.description: Forcefully terminate any stubborn process or application by name

ram_expert_info.bat.description: Get deep hardware details about your RAM: manufacturer, part number, speed (MHz), and capacity

time_syncer.bat.description: Forcefully synchronize your system clock with internet time servers to fix time drift

dns_benchmark.bat.description: Benchmark popular DNS servers to find the fastest one for your internet connection

event_log_wiper.bat.description: Wipe all Windows event logs to free up space and improve privacy

hosts_file_manager.bat.description: Quickly edit the Windows hosts file to block websites or redirect IP addresses

gpu_info_extra.bat.description: Get detailed hardware info about your NVIDIA/AMD/Intel graphics card (VRAM, drivers, resolution)

windows_update_fixer.bat.description: Repair broken Windows Update services and clear update cache to fix errors

restore_point_manager.bat.description: Manage Windows System Restore points: list, create, and access system protection tools
